author: m.kalinin
content:
There is a need of a quick resolution to the following issue:

EL implementations return deposits in the list called `deposit_requests` in the Engine API (conformant with the Engine API spec). Seems like CL expects `deposit_receipts` instead (due to CL spec has not been updated with EIP-7685).

There is a need for a quick resolution to faciliate devnet-0 launch. Doing a proper renaming on CL side might involve more engineering (and even affects test format) thus there are two options: 
1) EL switches back to `deposit_receipts`, and then switches back again to `deposit_requests` (there is a PR to the Engine API, https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/544)
2) CL marshals `deposit_receipts` as `deposit_requests` and after devnet-0 undergoes a full renaming

The question is Option 2 easy to do for CLs (to avoid ELs doing back and forth)?

Sorry for the last minute change and for tagging every team, I understand it might be annoying

author: tersec
content: Nimbus's serialization libraries can handle option 2 fine
